channel.title: Summon-Pkz 508 [Development Tracking Topic]
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I am currently working on a 508, because I never realised before how much more fun it is to Code/Play on than 317's. I would make a 474 server, but no-one has mapdata for 474's apart from Zee Best, Because In my opinion, The old graphics are better, but the new emotes are good, such as the Whip, Rune C' bows etc. Heres a short Video I made: http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=vu2WOQD-rFo So, let's get onto the current features. [u][b]Features[/b][/u] [ul][li]Based from Palidino76's V2 server.[/li] [li]Starting place probably lumbridge, unless I find a better place to start.[/li] [li]Fully working following.[/li] [li]Fully working GodWars, with All NPC's in the right place.[/li] [li]All 4 GodWars bosses are Fully functional with the correct attacks and Projectiles etc.[/li] [li]Very good Combat.[/li] [li]All special attacks, apart from the BarrelChest Anchor, which I am making soon.[/li] [li]Fully working projectiles with Range.[/li] [li]Fully working AutoCasting with Ancient/Modern magics.[/li] [li]Fully working Defence and attack Bonuses for Melee, ranged and Magic.[/li] [li]Fully working NPC defence and Attack Bonuses.[/li] [li]Fully working banking.[/li] [li]A starting base for Dueling, no staking at the moment.[/li] [li]Fully working wilderness levels[/li] [li]Bounty Hunter can be enabled/disabled by a command that can only be used by me.[/li] [li]Fully working NPC drops.[/li] [li]Start of the fight Caves.[/li] [li]Fully working Tzok-Jad with all three attacks, and projectiles (Random for which attack he uses).[/li] [li]Fully working Skulling.[/li] [li]Only half of prayer at the moment.[/li] [li]Full 1v1 in EdgeVille (Going to add all 1v1 areas soon).[/li] [li]Fully working KBD, Kalphite Queen, Tzok-Dill, and many more High leveled NPC's.[/li] [li]Fully working GodWars point system (Must have a certain amount of points to enter the Boss area's.[/li] [li]Fully working C' Bow random specials with Bolts, for example the Dragon bolt (e) special would Higher your max hit, and do the Dragon Fire GFX on the other player.[/li][/ul] And alot more, I just can't be bothered to list it all. [b] I Will put pictures onto this Thread Later.[/b] [u][b] Development[/b][/u] 16 November 2008:
- Made it so you cannot use Certain ammo with Different ranged weapons (For example you now cannot use Rune arrows with a maple Bow). - Added some more Block Animations. - Increased the Karils X bow's power, since it was only hitting something like 20 as the max.
Watch the Short Video http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=vu2WOQD-rFo http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=vu2WOQD-rFo

item.title: Summon-Pkz 508 [Development Tracking Topic]
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Hey everyone, I am currently working on a 508, because I never realised before how much more fun it is to Code/Play on than 317’s. I would make a 474 server, but no-one has mapdata for 474’s apart from Zee Best, Because In my opinion, The old graphics are better, but the new emotes are good, such as the Whip, Rune C’ bows etc.

Heres a short Video I made: http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=vu2WOQD-rFo

So, let’s get onto the current features.

Features

[ul][li]Based from Palidino76’s V2 server.[/li]
[li]Starting place probably lumbridge, unless I find a better place to start.[/li]
[li]Fully working following.[/li]
[li]Fully working GodWars, with All NPC’s in the right place.[/li]
[li]All 4 GodWars bosses are Fully functional with the correct attacks and Projectiles etc.[/li]
[li]Very good Combat.[/li]
[li]All special attacks, apart from the BarrelChest Anchor, which I am making soon.[/li]
[li]Fully working projectiles with Range.[/li]
[li]Fully working AutoCasting with Ancient/Modern magics.[/li]
[li]Fully working Defence and attack Bonuses for Melee, ranged and Magic.[/li]
[li]Fully working NPC defence and Attack Bonuses.[/li]
[li]Fully working banking.[/li]
[li]A starting base for Dueling, no staking at the moment.[/li]
[li]Fully working wilderness levels[/li]
[li]Bounty Hunter can be enabled/disabled by a command that can only be used by me.[/li]
[li]Fully working NPC drops.[/li]
[li]Start of the fight Caves.[/li]
[li]Fully working Tzok-Jad with all three attacks, and projectiles (Random for which attack he uses).[/li]
[li]Fully working Skulling.[/li]
[li]Only half of prayer at the moment.[/li]
[li]Full 1v1 in EdgeVille (Going to add all 1v1 areas soon).[/li]
[li]Fully working KBD, Kalphite Queen, Tzok-Dill, and many more High leveled NPC’s.[/li]
[li]Fully working GodWars point system (Must have a certain amount of points to enter the Boss area’s.[/li]
[li]Fully working C’ Bow random specials with Bolts, for example the Dragon bolt (e) special would Higher your max hit, and do the Dragon Fire GFX on the other player.[/li][/ul]

And alot more, I just can’t be bothered to list it all.


I Will put pictures onto this Thread Later.


Development

16 November 2008:

- Made it so you cannot use Certain ammo with Different ranged weapons (For example you now cannot use Rune arrows with a maple Bow). - Added some more Block Animations. - Increased the Karils X bow's power, since it was only hitting something like 20 as the max.

Watch the Short Video

http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=vu2WOQD-rFo
http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=vu2WOQD-rFo

Read full topic
